Save viewed images: Fi aworan ti a wo pamọ
Drop folder here or click to select: Ju folder nibi tabi tẹ lati yan
Click the button below or drag a folder: Tẹ bọtini isalẹ tabi fa folder nibi
No folder selected: Ko si folder ti a yan
No images found in selected folder and s: Ko si aworan ti a ri ninu folder ti a yan ati awọn subfolder
Ko si aworan lati fi han. Yan folder.
Try using B, V, H, R, and G keys to expe: Gbiyanju lati lo awọn bọtini B, V, H, R ati G lati ṣe ayẹyẹ pẹlu awọn ipa lori logo.
All images have been viewed. Starting ov: Gbogbo aworan ti a wo. N bẹrẹ lẹẹkansi.
Press Space to start new session: Tẹ Space lati bẹrẹ ise tuntun
File is already deleted or inaccessible: Faili ti pa tẹlẹ tabi ko le wọle
Are you sure you want to move the file t: O da ọ loju pe o fẹ gbe faili si ibi idoti?
Failed to move file to trash: Kuna lati gbe faili si ibi idoti
Ko si awọn aworan miiran ti o wa lati kọ si.
No more valid images found in the folder: Ko si awọn aworan ti o tọ sii ti a ri ninu folder.
No images available to skip to: Ko si awọn aworan ti o wa lati kọ si
About GestArt Text:
GestArt jẹ oluyaworan aworan ti a ṣe lati ran awọn oniṣẹ lọwọ lati ṣe idanwo aworan isara, ṣe aworan awọn ipo, ati wo awọn aworan itọkasi.

Fun ọpọlọpọ ọdun, mo lo eto miiran ati emi ko yẹ pẹlu rẹ ni awọn apakan kan. Otitọ ni pe emi ko mọ lati kọ koodu funra mi. Mo lo ọpọlọpọ oṣu nija pẹlu AI, eyiti o maa ba eto ni kikun, ṣugbọn bayi o ni eto yii ti AI kọ da lori ero mi. A pinnu lati ṣe eto ni kikun open-source, ọfẹ lati lo, pin, ati yipada.

Awọn ẹbun: Ero - LeonWGal; Koodu - Cursor; Ohun iṣiro - Mixkit; Awọn aami - Tabler

Isalẹ ni awọn ọna asopọ mi nibiti o le kan mi tabi ran mi lọwọ. Mo gbọdọ kọ mi ni pe emi jẹ oniṣẹ NSFW pataki, nitorinaa ma ṣe akiyesi.
Instructions Text:
Awọn iṣakoso ipilẹ:
• Space - Duro/Tẹsiwaju timer
• Awọn ọfa osi/ọtun - Aworan tẹlẹ/to tẹle
• S - Kọ aworan lọwọlọwọ
• Delete - Gbe aworan lọwọlọwọ si ibi idoti

Iṣakoso aworan:
• Gbooro aga tabi +/- - Mu sinu/jade
• Tẹ ati fa - Pan nigba ti a mu sinu
• B - Filtẹ dudu ati funfun
• V - Yi pada vertical
• H - Yi pada horizontal
• R - Yi 90°
• Backspace - Tun gbogbo awọn ipa aworan pada

Awọn ẹya afikun:
• G - Yipada gridi apẹrẹ
• T - Fi han/Mu timer
• A - Yipada 'Nigbagbogbo lori'
• O - Ṣii aworan lọwọlọwọ
• C - Da aworan si clipboard
• Ctrl+, - Ṣii awọn eto
